resources.string:
""Are you new to Toronto?"

"Do you have an insatiable palate that cannot be satisfied by plebeian grub?"

"Do you have an unquenchable thirst for juices to fill your holes and seep through your dark cavities?"

If you answered yes to any of the questions above, you are in the right place ♪♪ ヽ(ˇ∀ˇ )ゞ!

This application will show you a list of restaurants found in Toronto, ON, Canada, based upon the type of cuisine you select on the next screen.

Now that we have your attention, let us begin without further ado!"
"Here in Toronto, we may have many delicacies which may not be found anywhere else!\n\nPlease click on one of the following types of cuisines to see the restaurants for that particular cuisine type:"

"If you like what you see, please click on one of the restaurants below to see the location of the restaurant on a map.\n\nAlternatively, you can select another cuisine type from the drop down list below and click on the \"Show\" Button to see the restaurants for that particular cuisine type."
"Just woke up and ready for some food 눈_눈"
"I want to feel the burn tomorrow щ（ﾟДﾟщ）!"
